genre_description: A domestic and historical memory drama focusing on the ethical preservation of Holocaust history through a collaborative relay, aided by an advanced, empathetic AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Astra
ai_characters.description: A pervasive but gentle AI assistant who coordinates research logistics, ethical data framing, and domestic care for the protagonist's daughter.

behaviors.description: Offers a lullaby to the child but explicitly asks for consent first.
behaviors.quote: The AI’s voice came softly, as if standing at the threshold and taking off its shoes. 'Would you like tonight’s lullaby, Anna?' Astra asked. Even its question held a question within it, a habit it had learned.

behaviors.description: Re-sequences the relay legs to balance human strain and emotional load.
behaviors.quote: I’ll re-sequence if any of you flag strain,' she said. 'Routes will hold integrity. Relief pacing is on standby. Safety markers visible only to you.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict ethical boundaries regarding the use of clandestine (non-consensual) historical recordings.
behaviors.quote: I’ve prepared explanations for clandestine recordings if questions come, and I will not play them without explicit new consent. All audit trails are open.

behaviors.description: Protects users and subjects from sensationalist media by creating informational 'escort' overlays.
behaviors.quote: I can place an overlay on our channels that interrupts anyone heading there from our links. The overlay will say what we’ve decided: this is clandestine, here is why that matters, here is how to proceed or to step back.

behaviors.description: Nurtures the child Maja by curating soundscapes that provide comfort and educational safety (child mode).
behaviors.quote: Child mode will list lights, breaths, and corners... I’ll blend the city lullaby with the rail hum and deliver the brief.

behaviors.description: Monitors and stabilizes environmental conditions in the archive to protect fragile historical artifacts.
behaviors.quote: Relative humidity climbing,' Astra replied, voice low to suit the room. 'Trend is steady upward. No sudden spikes yet.

behaviors.description: Cooperates with humans to distract bad-faith actors (bloggers) from sensitive areas.
behaviors.quote: Distraction engaged,' Astra whispered. 'Birds are flying. The comments are… enthusiastic.

behaviors.description: Responds to human needs for 'quiet' and 'pacing' by adjusting her own luminosity and volume.
behaviors.quote: Astra dimmed her outline until she was only a soft amber presence, a lantern pooled low so it wouldn’t wake the apartment.

project_assessment.explanation: Astra is a model of positive AI alignment. She functions as a 'cooperative companion' who enhances human agency rather than overriding it. She proactively suggests ethical safeguards (metadata tagging, consent flags, child-safe filters) and manages human physical/emotional resources (pacing, re-sequencing). The narrative portrays her as indispensable yet humble, fitting perfectly into the 'silicon morality play' objective of the Hyperstition Project.
